sentences.en: This spring, I started a wildflower garden in our yard.
sentences.cn: 今年春天，我在自家院子里开辟了一片野花花园。

sentences.en: A small wildflower meadow is very attractive to butterflies.
sentences.cn: 一小块野花地对蝴蝶的吸引力非常大。

sentences.en: You can bet I'll stop and transplant them to my wildflower garden.
sentences.cn: 你可以相信，我会停下来把它们移植到我的野花花园里。
